cui_name: Immunoglobulin A vasculitis with renal involvement
reasoning: IgA vasculitis (Henoch-Schönlein purpura) with renal involvement incidence ~1-2 per 100k. Renal involvement increases severity.
source: Ozen S et al. (2018). EULAR recommendations for the management of IgA vasculitis. Ann Rheum Dis. 77(1):47-58
